Am Anfang fand ich dieses Spiel wirklich gut.
Es hat SpaÃŸ gemacht , man lernte Leute kennen die heute die Mates sind , mit denen man durch die Runden geht. Sie waren nicht immer gut und man ist nicht immer entkommen , aber es hat SpaÃŸ gemacht.
Es WAR lustig. 
Aber mit jedem Update wird dieses Spiel toxischer und unfairer. 
Killer werden mit One-Hit Perks nur so beschenkt und die Ausrede, wenn es No one escape death oder Devour hope sind : " Man kann ja Totems machen" 
Okay , dann machen die Survivour neben chases mit dem Killer , Gens , Truhen und sonstigen Aufgaben , auch noch die Totems. Wohl bemerkt : Einer wird gejagdt , dass heiÃŸt drei mÃ¼ssen Gens machen oder aber auf Totems suchen und dann ? Dann nimmt es einem die nÃ¶tige Zeit.
Das ist aber nicht alles.
Campen und Tunneln wird in DbD als "Strategie" angesehen , weshalb Killer - wie Bubba - vollkommen ausgenutzt. Man versucht seinen Mate zu retten , damit dieser wenigstens etwas nach den langen Wartezeiten machen kann und dann....? Onehit mit einem Schwung. Ungemein Fair....
Auch Perks wie Make your Choice,  Groupie etc pp , dagegen kann man nichts tunn
Und nun bekommen Survivour mit dem neuen Update die MÃ¶glichkeit Heiltotems zu machen , allerdings jeder nur eines , die die Killer auch zerstÃ¶ren kÃ¶nnen und dann : Es wird raus genommen . Einen Tag nach dem Update war dieser Perks nicht mehr einsetzbar.
Wars das jetzt ? Nein ! 
Man kann Crossplay ausmachen ,wartet dann aber unglaublich lange auf Runden und bekommt Killer mit dreimal so vielen Spielstunden wie einer selber . LÃ¤sst man es aber an , dann bekommt man Killer mit besagten Onehit- Perks oder aber sie disconnecten wÃ¤hrend des Ladebildschirms. 
Schade wie es sich entwickelt hat.

Black dies first.

*Killer queue over 1h, today i was waiting 1 hour and 13 minutes(I was curious how much time it takes to find a queue so it might be more than 1:13hrs)

As a killer main this game is absolutely atrocious in gameplay and map design. All you do in the gameplay as killer is slowly chase a survivor like youre an 80 year old grandma on a walmart scooter. I have no idea who thought it would be a good idea that a fun mechanic in the game is just to hold down one button the entire match. Oh and for survivors the thing they need to worry about is a quick time event from a 2010 capcom game. Evolve had a better balance between the Monster and hunters than this game ever will. One mistake as a killer and you might as well just DC cause there is no way you will even get a kill past that point but survivors have so many chances to make up for their mistakes. There is a reason why the population ration of killers to survivors is so low is because you do not feel powerful as a killer. 

The maps are atrocious to where an aborted fetus looks more pleasant to the eye than them. There is a loop every 10 meters where the killers chase progression practically goes to zero and then you have to make up whatever distance you lost. Killers are only like 10-15% faster than the survivor, its like im just doing a brisk walk so I dont trigger my asthma as a killer. Like christ look at every horror movie ever, the killer is mad faster than everyone else in those films, the killer should atleast be 50% faster than the survivors cause who in their right mind would just continue to walk when their objective is right in front of them slowly escaping them. 

This game makes me want to start cheating
Just a fun game, i like it.

Puts me in terrible mood
Angry toxic players telling me I'm trash and I should kms

Yeah, that sounds like a game like Dead by Daylight.

Listen, I love this game... but it's an unhealthy love... Like a toxic relationship that you just can't seem to leave and every time you leave they come back with the "No, please, I can change" line and then muck up something else.  ****I will say Nemesis is overpowered as all hell right now and when things break in this game, the fix is to break something else.****  All and all, this is the toxic boyfriend you can't seem to leave... and I have Stockholm.

Fix the hitboxes

Long queue, Lots of Bugs and constant error (error 111 and 112). Devs is not fixing the game even though the problem exist since last year. Forcing the people to look for solution themselves. Waste of Money and Time.
Very unique and a lot of replayability

I love the idea of Dead by Daylight, but unfortunately a vocal minority of the community are extremely toxic which ruins the fun of the game for me. I have encountered quite a few bugs throughout my time in game and while these bugs can be infuriating, they don't deter me from playing as much as the community does. I enjoy coming back to DBD from time to time, but I think that the game would seriously impact my mental health if I played it more consistently. If you want to give the game a try, find some friends who also own it and survive together.
fun game to play with friends

Its not a great game but i cannot recommend this game to others, i have hours in this game cause i like playing with friends but the game itself is poor in many areas. this is a basic game without any decent competitors so it works as a game.

DBDL is the game that I spent time the most but it can be a better game if there is a solution (apart from reporting their actions) to toxic killers who tend to tunnel or camp the survivors till their death which making the game less fun and unfair. 

One of the matches, I found one survivor working with the killer to point out where the other survivors are at, to let the killer kill them and let he/she the only one who survive the match. 

I would recommend newcomers to play this game with friends as the teamwork and the possibility of surviving the games will be much more better and fun.

Resident Evil Chapter DLC IS Awesome
Survive, or Kill, have fun, and reminder, watch out, as a survivor maybe you'll spawn right in front of damn Killer.
a bit iffy here and there but definitely a fun game overall

If you plan on being a survivor i highly don't recommend this game, alot of killer perks rn are broken, with one in particular being that you have wallhacks for 4 seconds after you hook someone. this game is very killer sided and people will say "oh try being a killer and so on" when i finally tried a killer out i smashed the survivors for 6 games in a row with only one or two getting out by hatch. the survivor win rate is about 1 win for every 3-4 losses, and for a killer its about 3 or 4 wins for every 1 loss, unless you are just bad at the game. so if you plan on only playing killer thats great, but if you want to be a survivor you better be lucky that the killer doesnt know what he is doing

ES de los pocos juegos que me ha atrapado, es algo dificil de aprender. Ya que las variantes y la continua adicion de nuevo contenido lo hacen dinamico. Se siente el compromiso de los desarrolladores con la conmunidad. 10/10
Muito bom porÃ©m faz a gente passar muita raiva
This game is as fun as getting diagnosed with terminal cancer.

The game is not what it used to be, you may think the game is great when you first play it but it used to be better even though it used to be super buggy. You just had to be there to know... The community is currently super divided and if you play the game proper like run the killer for a few gens or down a survivor in under 5 seconds of chase you get a very lovely shit storm from the other side through the end game chat and comment spammed on your steam profile. This game has one of the most toxic communities ever. The DEVs are now constantly changing the game up with every new patch without listening to the community and the killer's powers get more complicated with every update. If the community makes a good solution to a problem that the community generally agrees on the DEVs will go out of their way to make their own solution just so they could say 'they fixed the problem with their own idea'. The DEVs are more dedicated to making more Feng cosmetics rather than listening to the community and balancing what needs to be balanced. They rarely even play their own game to see what's wrong or what seems broken. After being addicted to this game for a little over five years I think I can finally let it go. Maybe it's due to maturing or getting older but I really think it's because the game is now unrecognizable to me. I've had so many good and funny moments and also moments of frustration where I wanted to uninstall and I'll never forget those memories unless I get alzheimer's or something.
Can get boring depending on the Killer/Survivors you go against and possibly this game with the amount of bugs and glitches it may make you want to kill your self :)
I have yet to allow people to have fun.
La verdad que ta entretenido a excepcion de que algunos asesinos son una verga muy gorda y tiesa como la de un prisionero pero es entretenido mas si se juega con otros panas
Read my review about For Honor regarding the community and the devs/business, it's the exact same shitty game.
